info.title: WordApp Question Answering Tool
info.description: This tool allows you to ask thought-provoking questions and get answers using the WordApp API.

post.description: Send a thought-provoking question to the WordApp API and receive an answer. Return only the text inside the 'content' field of the response.

Type a Thought Provoking Question that u.description: The thought-provoking question you want to ask, which uses internet search.
Type a Thought Provoking Question that u.example: What are the implications of quantum computing on encryption?

required: Type a Thought Provoking Question that uses internet search

version.description: The version number you want to use. Use the caret syntax to get the latest non-breaking version.

200.description: Successful response with the answer to the thought-provoking question

content.description: The answer to the thought-provoking question

400.description: Bad request, likely due to missing or invalid parameters
